website_summaries.verdict: Solid construction and good design make this ottoman a classic addition to any room.
pros: Large enough to store a few blankets
Sturdy design makes it usable as extra seating
cons: The buttons on some units come off easily

customer_reviews.title: Not so nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these awhile ago and you get what you pay for, looked good for a while and then started to rip and the faux leather wearing away. Both look like this one
customer_reviews.author: Dominick R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I exchange the ottoman the second time because the button popped off, Received another one January 13, 2017. Going on two months, now the stitching on the topside is separating. I wanted to exchange again, but I exceeded the time. You get what you paid for. Check out the photo. The pens point to the seams separating.
customer_reviews.author: @resist4mykids

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, did not survive the first use
customer_reviews.text: Just received this ottoman yesterday and rested my feet on it an hour or so. This morning I noticed one of the 4 buttons on top has fallen apart. Now I have 3 original brown buttons and one broken, bare metal base. Unacceptably poor construction!
customer_reviews.author: Moving On

customer_reviews.title: Nice, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ottoman, EXCEPT that 5 weeks after we received it (and one week outside Amazon's return window), one of the buttons on top came apart. It looks like the button was not crimped properly. This may not sound like a big deal, but it ruins the the whole thing. We've tried several ways to put the button back together, but it won't stay together. An upholstery shop or a special tool is what it needs. I've now seen other reviews of this product with the same problem, so it's a problem the manufacturer and Amazon should know about. If I can return this one, I'd order another one
customer_reviews.author: Scott from Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When attaching the legs, the bolt in just one leg did not fit the pre-fitted counter-sunk nut inside the ottoman bottom (like the other 3 did fit). I had to go to 3 hardware stores to find a particular bolt to fit it. It was really odd! Also, now the stitching near two of the tufted buttons is coming undone. We do not abuse the ottoman. I just occasionally rest my socked feet (no shoes) on the ottoman, and once in awhile sit on it, but why is the stitching now coming apart around two of the tufted buttons? Very disappointed. Have only had it about 3 months I think. Thus, I would hesitate to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size, great look.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two and they are beautiful. Legs were super easy to install, no tools required. Perfect spot for the remotes and for serving snacks in the den.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality ottoman, beautiful leather, very sturdy. I bought for my handicapped dog to get down more easily off my very high bed. He's 65 pounds so this is very sturdy and does the job beautifully. The storage was a bonus. Very easy to assemble - just screw on the legs. Great value and quality piece, plus it is a beautiful deep wine color. Very classy.
customer_reviews.author: Katydid

customer_reviews.title: Great storage ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brown ottoman to store extra towels. I needed a stool to sit on in my large bathroom. This was perfect. I stored 5 large bath towels and six good sized hand towels in this with room left over for a couple more. What a great buy. Well made and attractive as well as practical. I have a large sink cabinet with everything else. I simply measured the space that I could use and got on Amazon, my favorite website to shop, and found it fairly quickly. Thank you to the seller and Amazon for your very good price. This is made well with a hinged lid. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Really like them and very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I do like these these ottomans. I bought 4 to put in a square and to double as seating for extra guest. They hold the blanket/ lap throws and computers. And mostly, they are our footrest-where the rough use comes in. I knew they were not of super quality, but I’m handy and someday will replace the faux- leather fabric on top- but without the buttons-as that is your ripping point. I would buy these again, if needed. And the red is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Pacific Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about a year...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 2 stars since I guess I got my money's worth out of it, but would not buy again or recommend. I used it daily to keep my legs elevated. A button came off after a few months. Then, after about a year, the faux leather discintigrated and I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: ILuvFtMyers

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Well Made, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: received well protected, legs inside the ottoman, also well protected and not bouncing around. Assembly easy (screw on the legs). Found a 1/2" cut in the leatherette on the bottom edge. Sealed it to prevent possibility of tearing. Not a bad cut and in a place not noticeable, but it should have been repaired by the assembler. All said and done, its a good product for the money and looks very nice in my home.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend in a rehab nursing home......she's going to be there a while, so I figured, why not be comfortable?? This ottoman was perfect: easy to assemble, looks great, comfortable, and has storage. The hinges and spring-loaded thingy that keeps the top open, work great; the top doesn't slam shut, but closes nicely. The faux leather looks good and is easy to clean. No cons whatsoever. A+
customer_reviews.author: CR Mainwearing

customer_reviews.title: THERE’S NOTHING LIKE MORE STORAGE.
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman. Bought it to replace a old one that had a top that would turn over and become a tray to hold things. Alas, it was very difficult to get the top off. This ottoman has a hinged top. I keep a lot of magazines and knitting stuff in it so it is close but out of sight if I am not using it. The storage is wonderful. The top will stay open without holding it while I look for something inside. This was a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great storage seat that blends into almost any decor.
customer_reviews.text: We just got this to replace a smaller version that felt like a child's seat. This feels like a full size adult seat and has decent storage inside. The hinge holds the seat open with no locking mechanism which makes putting items in and pulling them back out super easy. It loses a bit of storage capacity due to the legs, but the legs make it look much more like furniture. When we have people over to watch the game, we can move it next to the couch and have one more place to sit. Oh yeah, I guess it can be an ottoman too. We're very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Book

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Great ottoman. We were looking at $250 Ottoman but these are 1/5 the price and almost the same thing. Slightly smaller but actually same or more storage. Very sturdy hi dc t screw on legs and done. $250 below in pic
customer_reviews.author: bigskiohio

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stool. Some reviews said it fell apart easy but I have had mine 2 months and its perfect. I use it every day. For the price, even if it ends up losing a button or something else, I would buy another. Very pleased with what I am needing and using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Lea B

customer_reviews.title: Great value - excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Looking for an ottoman or hassock is not an easy task, as they are not available in many retail locations. We had seen some at Target, but the price and/or quality did not meet our needs. This one is well built, has good storage, is comfortable as a foot stool and a good value. RECOMMENDED John J Hogan
customer_reviews.author: johnjhogan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality storage box. It's the perfect size to put in front of my loveseat to prop up my feet. The lid lifts up on the box and allows for storage. This is great for me because I can toss in items that I use and no longer clutter my end table. The padding is thick and the box is made well. I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The seams by two of the buttons were already coming undone before i took it out of the box. I wish i could send it back but that would be too much trouble for me. I wouldnt bit furniture from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Love these ottomans! I have them in my foyer under a console table. They store hats, gloves, etc. and offer seating for putting on shoes. The foldables, which are cheaper woud've been good for storage, but not for seating. The material and finish on these are better, too, because of the hinged top. I'm very happy with this purchase. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but not for long!
customer_reviews.text: Seam split after only 3 months of use. Used as a leg rest only and couldn't hold up 3 months! Bad or rotten thread used to sew top square. Np product satisfaction warranty? I trusted Amazon to offer a quality product. Shame on me!
customer_reviews.author: Manzaraliman

customer_reviews.title: I hated the feet
customer_reviews.text: I hated the feet! It did not slide well across carpet at all. Replaced the feet with rollers, it made it about an inch lower, rolls just fine, and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: lightweight with storage
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is lightweight, yet sturdy. My mom uses it when she kicks back on the couch and puts up her feet. The fact it doubles as a storage, she stores her comfy blanket in it. It mostly comes assembled. Just screw in the four feet and you are done. The color, and the build was fine. no issues there. Just one tip, after you open the box, air it out. It has that fake leather smell that does go away in a day or two. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jay.A

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Nice Storage Compartment, and You Can’t Tell it Isn’t Real Leather
customer_reviews.text: One of my colleagues bought this to slide under her desk at work and I had to have one. When it arrived, however, my husband tested it out, and moved it into our den. I kept saying, “ it isn’t even real leather,” and “ it doesn’t match our leather furniture” but my protests fell on deaf ears. And I have to admit, it really does look good. It is well-constructed and the storage space suprisingly large. (Space enough for a throw, magazines, DVD’s, small games). So I can attest to high quality form and function. And as soon as I can sneak it out of the den, it will be a useful addition to my office.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Libris

customer_reviews.title: Not for arthritic/weak-handed people !
customer_reviews.text: I Strogly Disagree with Your assessment - that installing the legs on your ottoman is, "Easy Assembly." In order to make legs flush, and of greatest importance - have a Tight Fit......... Took an ENORMOUS amount of energy/ strength ! Product Not for someone with weak and/or arthritic hands !
customer_reviews.author: Paul E.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! A good amount of storage.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have only had it for a few weeks but I really like it. Looks great and has a good amount of storage inside. My family loves to play board games and it's a great place to store the games when they aren't in use. Also serves as an extra seat when we are all together and my husband uses it as a foot rest when he sits in the rocking chair. I haven't experienced any of the issues some others wrote about but like I said I haven't had it very long so guess we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Orlandi

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our room
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to purchase after reading some of the reviews but crossed my fingers and am very pleased. After about 2 months I can honestly say it had held up well-no problems with the buttons as others mentioned. It looks good and almost a perfect match to our couch. Looks much more expensive than it was. Great value! Sturdy and a more spacious inside storage than I expected. Easy to assemble. The only reason I am not giving it 5 stars is it is just a wee bit small for a footstool but great as an extra seat. However, it works well enough and I would like to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: mommermom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, even 6+ months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this buy. True to color, stores our blankets and guest bedsheets easily. Very solid, serves as footrest and chair on the regular — and the top is padded nicely. Pleather has withstood our two dogs. Doesn’t take up much space, apartment-friendly. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: This is a great storage ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This is a great storage ottoman, especially for the price. We bought this as a stool for the kids to sit on while they play computer games... didn't want anything too comfortable or they'd be there forever. ;) This works perfectly. It is a good height for them to sit at, slides neatly under the computer desk to get it out of the room and out of the way, and doubles as storage for computer cords, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C

customer_reviews.title: looks great and holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ottoman! Cleans easy, holds a lot of stuff, and looks good. My only wish is that the legs were shorter. It was too high to be comfortable as a foot rest, so I just have it without the legs. If it had 1'' legs, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Vail

customer_reviews.title: Doubles perfectly as extra seating and added storage
customer_reviews.text: After the holidays, I vowed to figure out how to add seating to our crowded, small living space. I finally came up with the idea of storage ottomans and found 2 of these. They are perfect in height for sitting or to use as an ottoman and, also have a good deal of storage space under the hinged, well-built lids. I couldn't be more pleased!!! Additionally, they each came wrapped and boxed securely and arrived in a timely fashion!!
customer_reviews.author: LYNDON EFFINGER

customer_reviews.title: Space saving storage
customer_reviews.text: Because I have a smaller living space I needed something for storage and to sit on to put on my socks. This works perfectly. I didn't use the legs as I'm only 5' and the legs made it too high for my purpose. There is adequate storage space. The tufted exterior is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this ottoman it isn't really large I have two comfy blankets in it. BUT the legs are cheesy looking and ruin it so I threw them away because it looks like a nice leather ottoman and I like it just sitting on the floor and my grandchildren and sit on it. Also it is a dark chocolate brown I think the color is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shellers

customer_reviews.title: Solved our problem perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The perfect answer to replacing the foot rest on our power recliner that does not work anymore. It fits perfectly in height to and width. We were quoted a lot of money to fix the chair and this was the more practical solution . It also matches our brown leather recliner perfectly. The storage provided was a great plus.
customer_reviews.author: Yummy Tummy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if it would be a solid item at the price point, but this is absolutely perfect. Comfortable cushioning, good size, feels well-made, decent amount of storage/filing space. I didn't even bother putting on the legs, it's just the right height for me without them. I had considered paying almost twice this for something a little "dressier" but this looks just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Davies

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller than what I expected (even with the measurements. They were supposed to measure roughly one inch smaller in height than what I was replacing). They are also very light and slide around on hard floors. I wouldn't buy these again but they are also not the worst thing in the world.
customer_reviews.author: ANHW

customer_reviews.title: Ottoman for my spouse
customer_reviews.text: My spouse loves the sturdiness of it and the dark red color. We did remove the feet which makes it perfect to enjoy from his couch. I would definitely recommend this item for feet, seat, and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quality bench.
customer_reviews.text: This bench made a nice addition to our living room. Assembly consisted of attaching the four legs. The bench is very sturdy, and has lots of storage space. The upholstery seems to be holding up very well. We love this ottoman,
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: We like this storage square a lot
customer_reviews.text: We like this storage square a lot! The only "assembly" was easily attaching the enclosed "feet". It holds 3 of our blankets/throws with room to spare. The quality of the leatherette worried me when I ordered it but it looks and feels like good quality. The color blends well with our other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Mgt P

customer_reviews.title: JUST AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: CAN'T BEAT THIS FOR THE PRICE............WOW! NICE QUALITY AND THE LEGS MATCH THE WOOD ON MY CHAIR............GREAT STORAGE..........BUTTONS ARE ON TIGHT............GREAT, GREAT BUY!!!!!!!!!!!! WISH I HAD ROOM FOR ANOTHER ONE....................
customer_reviews.author: lila

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal on fashionable storage!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely FANTASTIC! Arrived on Time and undamaged. Took 30 seconds to put together. Very sturdy, looks way more expensive than what I paid for it and has an excellent storage space. I purchased two of them to use in front of my couch instead of one large ottoman because the room is smaller and this gave me a little more flexibility with how I could set the room up. We are using it to store our library books in our musical instruments in our homeschool room.
customer_reviews.author: Sabbath Moon Media

customer_reviews.title: Good storage option
customer_reviews.text: This was for my mom. She needed it to store some things in a rather small place and it worked wonderfully. She really likes it. She also commented that she is happy it stays open and doesn’t fall on her fingers when she is getting something out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clous

customer_reviews.title: Nice but..
customer_reviews.text: Came twice with rips in the fabric. Ordered from overstock same brand and it came perfect. So maybe it was the warehouse amazon uses that had the issue..?
customer_reviews.author: tsaunders

customer_reviews.title: Handy little piece
customer_reviews.text: Good storage area inside. Put all my items needed when a thunderstorm or snow storm hits the area and we lose power. Holds many items, looks good, and overall good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these and I love them. I preferred them without the legs on, so I never put them on. My adult children sit on them when they visit, and they are holding up well. Great storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne E

customer_reviews.title: Leatherette Ottoman-Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I paid $79 for this item in December 2018 and after just 5 months, the cover on one of the buttons has begun to separate. We are a retired couple without small children. The same item is now listed for $59...perhaps the decrease in price is due to quality? Not sure, but wouldn't recommend purchasing for more than $25.
customer_reviews.author: L. Liddle

customer_reviews.title: I liked the look of the product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of the product, but after only 4 months, the seams are coming apart. We don't sit on them, so must just be poor sewing on the product. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Morris

customer_reviews.title: I really like the storage and the height
customer_reviews.text: This is our third ottoman. I really like the storage and the height. I will note that if you are someone who pushes with your feet, the buttons may move and come off. We put a pillow on the top and that seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle and coffee

customer_reviews.title: Great , Daughter wants one now, haha
customer_reviews.text: Best item ive purchased here on amazon. perfect match for my furniture, very very sturdy, very attractive to any leather furniture,perfect height and a LARGE STORAGE.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend buying this poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: Within months of buying this, both the seams and buttons began to pull loose. I would not recommend buying this poorly made product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate 50

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this ottoman. I’ve ordered 3 that can be moved around for extra seating or placed together to form a bench. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: The ability to have other choices in where to sit and enjoy comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing my Home Pop Leatherette Tufted Storage hassocks, I used my Lazy-boy Easy chairs and sofa. Now I enjoy reading in my Living room and seated in my living room chairs using my Tufted Storage Hassocks as an accompaniment.
customer_reviews.author: Will’s choice

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman and storage cube
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ottoman/storage cube. It has removable legs and I personally use it without the legs. For me it is too tall with the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: so nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to add to our living room. We have two big leather couches and two larger ottomans. We are always fighting over room to rest legs of two people on each ottoman. (family of 4). These are so nice. They are a great color, rich solid brown. The storage inside is main reason I bought these. It can hold so much, blankets now to de- clutter living room. I did not screw the feet on them, this made them too high for my couch. I may cut the feet down and try again. I like the look of the feet, just not that tall. Soft, clean great product. Lid stays open with hinge.
customer_reviews.author: old school  Since 1960

customer_reviews.title: Nice ottoman, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have only had the ottoman for a few weeks but really like it. It is very comfortable to sit on and works perfectly in the bathroom vanity area for which I purchased it. I'll report back on durability concerns/issues reported by others after a few months. Update (11/2015): I've had this ottoman for 1.5 years and still really like it. It has stood up very well with daily use and I haven't really had any durability concerns. It is very comfortable. It was a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: me_akemi

customer_reviews.title: Ottoman with Storage
customer_reviews.text: I ORDERED 2 OF THEM AND SO FAR ONLY ONE CAME IN. WHAT DO I DO IF THE OTHER DOESN'T COME SOON. AS IN THE PIECE ,IT IS BEAUTIFUL. IT IT ACTUALLY BETTER THAN I EXPECTED IT TO BE. I JUST NEED BOTH/THE OTHER ONE ASAP. I AM HEARTBROKEN BECAUSE THE SECOND ONE DIDN'T COME IN TOO.
customer_reviews.author: ellen caponi

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off.  Didn’t last 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: When this ottoman arrived, we were very pleased with the look and storage capacity. It lasted a little more than 2 months before the seams started splitting. Biggest ripoff of the year! Terrible. I’m so angry at the poor quality. Do Not Buy This.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Foley

customer_reviews.title: Great footstool!
customer_reviews.text: Measurements are just perfect. The hinged lid can stay up and closes easily. Very sturdy and the color is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Master Q

customer_reviews.title: Functional not attractive. Seams came out first day
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for shoe storage. The top seams came out immediately after using the first day though. If you want attractiveness over functionality this is not the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra Graser

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value - exactly what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little ottoman for the money. It's lightweight, but the pad on top is plenty firm (for my feet). The storage box is almost the whole interior. I wouldn't sit on it (I'm a 6'2" guy) but for stated purposes, the ottoman is a fantastic value, and is exactly what it says it is. You do have to put the legs/feet on yourself, but there are no tools required and it takes about 90 seconds. Even if this only lasts a year or two it would be a great deal for the price/quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ottomans
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of these to replace an outdated coffee table in my family room. I absolutely love them! The serve as storage bins for pillows and blankeyd, individual foot rests, individual tables for eating, a large coffee table surface, or individual seats. They are sturdy and well made, and I would highly recommend them. SO glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: MyWorld

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size ottoman to raise your legs and read in comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height as an ottoman partnered with a reading chair. Timeless style so blends in with any decor. Decent leather-like fabric. Also big enough to be an extra seat if needed.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth carroll

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Worked as a great extra seat during holidays ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Worked as a great extra seat during holidays (people up to 150lbs) and absolutely no problems! Stores a couple of afghans. I even have a dog that loves to curl up on it when I put her blanket on top. Just great for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hindmon

customer_reviews.title: Quality is surprizing for such a great price
customer_reviews.text: Yes I love it. Start here. Shipped to Hawaii, for a mega fair price. Yes, really the cheapest one we could fine even remotely to the quality of this one was $179.00. This ottoman is super soft to sit on, nice pseudo leather, great height, and yes, wished it had the whole tray thingy, but we have the perfect square tray that fits on top. We decided to leave the legs off to give it totally stability. We have great weather, amazing beaches and not so great functional furniture choices, so once again, Amazon saves the day!!
customer_reviews.author: EAG2

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good looking for a few years but doesn't last with light use. The seams are coming undone by one of the tuft buttons and looks bad. Could end up unraveling and then the cushion on the ottoman would be useless.
customer_reviews.author: cub herrington

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a very functional piece. Easy to attach the legs. Has storage for whatever you want inside. Bought it for our camper. Looks fine with the dark leather upholstery and can be stored on the sofa when we pull in the slide-outs. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raji' Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice ottoman for storage!
customer_reviews.text: exactly as pictured and stylish. I wish I had gotten 2 Update Jan 24, 2017: I bought another!!! I use them as small coffee tables in front of the couch in a small apartment. It's perfect to keep guests' shoes in and for coasters and plates! I use this storage daily and my partner calls it "the cube"
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Handsome piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a birthday gift so he can put his feet up in the evening and relax while watching his favorite television programs. He loves it and it's a handsome piece of furniture. It's not too big or too small for our family room and he likes being able to store his favorite quilt and book in it, right at his feet. I love the buttons and padding on the top which make it more than just ordinary.
customer_reviews.author: Kardarl

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to my living room, very sturdy, lots of storage for my throws. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The stitching of this is ottoman appears to be good quality and the color is true brown (not like the reddish hue in one of the pictures). Great for the price and very comfortable to sit on but I suspect the foam cushion won't stay as cushy for very long. We don't sit on it regularly so it's not a problem but I do notice when we do, the cushion stays flat/saggy for a bit before it recovers. Then the price is great compared to what I've seen online and the color and storage was what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: KidzMom

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Cent !!!
customer_reviews.text: Its came quick, was easy to assemble and is just a cute add-on in the bedroom. Serves as s storage for those little nic nacs and a seat for my husband (when his ankle is swollen and he can't bend to put his shoes on or take it off).
customer_reviews.author: Will & Dash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fot stool
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, sits high enough and the storage feature is a plus. Looks very good.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Red

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. My favorite chair needed a foot rest. I store my light throw in it. Color matches my living room furniture too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lann

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty close match to my leather sofa. I find that I set things on it more often than for feet. Basically serves as a small table I move to whichever end of the sofa I'm on. Holds my wireless keyboard, remote, phone, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased, a substantial piece
customer_reviews.text: Given the very reasonable price this is an exceptional ottoman. It is larger and heavier than I had any reason to expect at this cost. The storage area is immense, I am more than pleased with that. The storage is nicely hidden, as long as the hinge side isn't facing you - you'd be hard pressed to look at it and know it had inside storage, a nice feature. I'm quite pleased with this substantial piece, a great addition to my den.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Wow--what a deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size (height and width) ottoman and exactly what I needed to go with a small club chair by my fireplace. I especially love the hinged top! The color is more brown than burgundy (I needed it to be burgundy), but when I realized how well made it is and that it is exactly the size I needed, I decided to keep it and have it recovered. I can justify spending the extra money because it is so reasonably priced. If brown is the color you need, this is a super deal!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Norris

customer_reviews.title: great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Nice size and very comfortable for feet/legs. Size is perfect and love the storage. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dickinson lover

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: Looks kind of cheap. It is heavy and I had to replace the wooden feet with casters. Otherwise it is too heavy to move around. With the caster feel, it is now practical.
customer_reviews.author: Carebear

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sturdy - good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and looks very well built. It was simple to install the legs - took 2 minutes. I am impressed with the quality for the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Larry15

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace an older one which was worn out. This on is smaller and we like it much better. Did not order because of the storage, but it is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: pammie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is great. It is very functional with a good deal of storage which is accessed through a hinged top. It is very well constructed and seems to be very durable. It is also quite handsome. I'm happy to have it in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for our small living room. They are attractive and useful. The color is rich. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: com fort and good looking
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so comfortable to put feet and legs on or just to sit on. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Walsberg

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. The are very sturdy and all you have to do is screw the legs on. The only down is they the picked up a musty smell from where they were stored. I had to air them out quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Perfect for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. Fits in with my furniture. Easy to tuck away.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Souter

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Size is good. Material is durable and cleans easily. Con: Hinge on the lid comes off too easily. Unable to reattach because the wood is cheap and the screws from the hinge make huge holes on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Well-built and sturdy - But!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised of the quality for the price. The ottoman is Well-built and sturdy, with plenty of storage space. Update: 26 months later!! leatherette has cracked and split in many, many places. What a mess!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little ottoman...perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is attractive and well constructed. The height perfectly aligns with any standard couch or loveseat. Also, best part is minimal assembly. You only need to screw on the feet and it's ready to go. We are able to fit 4 blankets inside, which is what we were looking for. Would be perfect for storing a few games or whatever else you need. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Lula E

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, buttons started popping off the first week we had it. Lining inside the lid was already ripping when we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly K.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased so my dog could get on the bed. It works great. Can wipe it off if she gets it dirty. Can fit 1-2 blankets inside depending on how heavy they are. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Lutz

customer_reviews.title: You wull love this Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: You wull love this Ottoman. I purchased two fo them and they are Excellent. Solid,attractive and practical with storage. Its looks very stylish in our Living Room. Easily slides across our hardwood floors without damaging or scarring it at all. It is very attractive and built with quality. The top is connected to the base with solid gold colored hinges. I highly recommend this.....
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Seams have split open along top. This appears to be very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Jon E. Bemis

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Color is represented well, dimensions are accurate. Storage holds a blanket and pillow. It is "recliner" height and plenty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TxMomma

customer_reviews.title: You can easily tell is it's vinyl
customer_reviews.text: You can easily tell is it's vinyl, but it is still a cure little piece for storage. It's functional and practical.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Use it all the time when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Use it all the time when I am watching TV and doing my crocheting. I keep my handy work inside and it is perfect. It fits quite a bit of stuff I was surprised at how much room it has inside. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great little ottoman
customer_reviews.text: The ottoman turned out to be a bit smaller than I imagined, but it ended up being perfect for where we wanted to use it. I love the hinged lid which actually stays up and out of the way. Would I buy this again? Yes! I wish I would have seen this one before purchasing the two others I had previously purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is the second I ordered. Loved the storage space and the overall look. The lid closes gently, which prevents little hands from injury. Also, color matches my chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to put my feet up with and had the pleasant surprise that it had a nice storage in it
customer_reviews.author: Isabel A. Zvorak

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Arrived nicely packaged and free from damage. Under five minutes to install the feet. I love that it has storage. I have three blankets in it with room for a couple more maybe. I think if an adult sat on it a lot, the cushion would definitely show wear. Works great as a foot rest and storage though.
customer_reviews.author: hdj

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive than what it is!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on Monday and it came two days later! It's very nice and sturdy and looks very classy in our living room. It's sturdy enought for me to sit and I love that it's a storage too. I actually put in another order for second one but since amazon it's sold out we're just awaiting the email to let us know when it'll be available. If you're looking for a good priced, NON cheap looking ottoman this is it. I'ts soft on top, durable on the sides and very sturdy. I had cousins over that used it as a seat and it had no problems holding them up.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine R Reyes

product_meta.title: HomePop Storage Bench Upholstered, Brown
product_meta.description: Color:BrownStyle meets function with this classic brown leatherette storage ottoman. It features button tufting and padded lift off top. Use this piece on its own or as a pair to make a statement in any room. The easy to attach wooden legs feature a light cherry finish which compliments the classic brown color. This stylish ottoman has a durable wooden frame with a 250 lb. Weight capacity which can accommodate most guest. Also available in a rich red color. Spot clean only by hand to clean visible spots or stains. Ottoman Dimensions are 17.5 inches in length, 17.5 inches in Width and 17.5 inches in Height.
feature_bullets: Features Classic Brown leatherette color with button tufting, padded lift off Top and the right amount of storage space to hide remote controls or magazines
Easy to attach wooden legs in a light Cherry Finish compliments the rich Brown color
The durable wooden frame has a 250 lb. weight capacity
Spot clean only by Hand to clean visible spots or stains

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,124 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
